Uses of Class
rt.HitRecord

  • Packages that use HitRecord 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.intersectables
    Implementations of the Intersectable interface.
    rt.materials
    Implementations of the Material interface.

    • Uses of HitRecord in rt

      Methods in rt that return HitRecord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HitRecord Intersectable.intersect(Ray r)
      Implement ray-surface intersection in this method.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Spectrum Material.evaluateBRDF(HitRecord hitRecord, javax.vecmath.Vector3f wOut, javax.vecmath.Vector3f wIn)
      Evaluate BRDF for pair of incoming and outgoing directions.
